section.heading: Appointment of Director.
section.text: The Department shall be headed by a Director, who shall:

para.text: Be appointed by the Mayor with the advice and consent of the Council, pursuant to § 1-523.01(a);
Be qualified by experience and training to carry out the purposes of the Department as set forth in § 7-1141.05; and
Serve at the pleasure of the Mayor.

annoGroup.heading: Short Title
annoGroup.annotation: Section 5111 of D.C. Law 20-61 provided that Subtitle J of Title V of the act may be cited as the “Department of Behavioral Health Establishment Act of 2013”.

annoGroup.heading: Editor's Notes
